title: Tonight my camera just stopped working. Main camera only so I can use a selfie one
content: That's what I'm getting everytime I'm tryna to open camera. Nothing is helping main camera is just not working. I was taking pictures today but in the evening it stopped doing a thing. It's not working is safe mode in Instagram and other apps. I just don't know what to do. Do only I have this problem? Scared for my phone please help me guys
